Main Page

From MarxWiki
Jump to: navigation, search

Welcome to MarxWiki

We'll be using this site this semester to develop a collaborative online encyclopedia of Marxist theory and cultural studies. If you want a sense of what such a site might be like, visit the Wikipedia.

You can create new pages or edit already existing pages. For help with editing, check out the WikiMedia Help Page.

As you read around in MarxWiki, you'll note that some links are blue and some are red; red links go to as-yet non-existent pages. Such links are a great way to expand the MarxWiki, by filling in gaps others have left behind, and by indicating paths for future development.

This project will only be as successful as you make it. Share the knowledge you have, and encourage others to do the same.

To begin, an entry on Marx himself...
